title: Understanding Annuities
text: An annuity involves a series of payments made at regular intervals. These payments are usually fixed in amount and occur over a specified period.

title: Characteristics of Annuities
text: Annuities are often used in financial planning and can be used for retirement savings, loan repayments, or insurance payouts.

hintAnswer: a series of fixed payments made at the end of each of a fixed number of periods at a fixed interest rate
title: Identifying Annuity Features
text: Which of the following best describes an annuity?
choices: a series of fixed payments made at the end of each of a fixed number of periods at a fixed interest rate
a group of numbers representing the loan amount
the cells listing the changes in policy
